title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Medina in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream or a dream through the vision website Roy2a.com and seeing a cactus in a dream indicates the collapse of anxiety and anxiety and overcoming difficulties and obstacles. It also indicates the rise of many responsibilities and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq in A dream by Ibn Sirin for an unmarried young man in a dream, as well as for an unmarried girl and a pregnant married woman, as well as for a man, as well as for a divorced woman and a widow, and that is through presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and other artists in ancient and modern times. Follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a cactus in a dream indicates happy news and happy occasions. Seeing cactus thorns in a dream indicates many adversities and problems and hearing sad news or harm from a person. Seeing a cactus indicates hearing good news and the end of worry and worry. Watching a cactus eating indicates guidance, integrity, and piety. Seeing a cactus plant in a dream indicates spending debts and overcoming difficulties. If a man sees himself planting cactus in a dream, it indicates the many benefits he reaps from a person or job, and eating cactus indicates his love for his children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a cactus in a dream for a single woman indicates wisdom and calm in making fateful decisions. If an unmarried woman sees that the cactus plant hurts her hand, she will announce her marriage to a rich man, achieving success and distinction in her life. If an unmarried girl sees that she has been diagnosed, he will give her a cactus plant. It shows that sadness will find their distress. Seeing a cactus in a girl’s dream announces her marriage to a good man with high morals. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet of God Saleh in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream for a woman? Pregnant: If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating aloe vera, this indicates the collapse of pregnancy and childbirth problems. To facilitate and facilitate childbirth, seeing a cactus in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a wise child and high morals in old age. Seeing a cactus plant in a pregnant woman’s dream portends a lot about the fetus enjoying good health. What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a cactus in a dream for a married woman seems to hear Good news and many good things that will enter her home. Seeing a green cactus in a dream for a married woman states that she bears many responsibilities of joy and happiness. If a married woman sees her husband eating a cactus, it says that she bears adversity and difficulties with her husband and overcomes obstacles. See also: Interpretation of a vision Tomatoes in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a cactus in a dream for a divorced woman indicates overcoming the crises, problems, and fears that you face. Seeing a cactus tree in a dream for a divorced woman announces that she is free of worries and problems.

title: Quarrel with a stranger or relatives

preview.html: But with regard to the differences in the doctrines of interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, and in the following lines we learn about the closest interpretations of seeing a fight with strangers and relatives in a dream. A quarrel with a stranger or relatives. There are many interpretations associated with witnessing a fight with strangers or relatives, including: If you see In a dream that you are arguing with your brother in a dream, this dream indicates a loss in trade. Also, some people who dream consider this a sign that they are making a wrong decision in life. On the other hand, whoever sees himself quarreling with his deceased parents. It is one of the warning visions to be sure Than the dreamer is on a path that does not please God nor pleases his deceased parents. Otherwise, when a quarrel appears with a girl’s mother and a girl in the dream. This indicates severe distress for the girl a few days after receiving offensive news. As for the dreamers’ vision, they always treat the family of Their home with cruelty and severity. This vision shows the intense love that the dreamers have for the people in their homes. The dreamer who quarrels with his manager in a dream and dreams of hitting him with a wooden stick is expected to get a lot of money. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about quarrels with relatives About unmarried women: If an unmarried woman sees in many of her dreams a quarrel with a stranger or with relatives, this has a number of interpretations, such as: Interpretation of dreams of fighting with an unmarried relative who are her friends. It shows the strength of their relationship, affection and love with her friends. As for the interpretation of a dream of a fight with an unmarried relative who are her friends. A quarrel. He is talking to an unmarried woman and her sister’s relatives. This is evidence of the happiness and joy that comes to him. We also witness a quarrel with a single girl and her mother. It is a sign of great love and understanding between her and her mother. Other than that, seeing the single girl fighting with people she does not know is a sign of great love and understanding between her and her mother. It is related to freedom. It seems that problems and worries are coming in her life, but she will spend a calm and beautiful time, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about fighting Ibn Sirin: A quarrel with a stranger or with relatives has different meanings from the point of view of the most famous dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin. Among these: Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a quarrel with relatives or acquaintances in a dream. It could be a symbol of the love that develops between the dreamer and the quarrel or the people with whom the quarrel occurred. The more the dispute increases, the greater the degree and magnitude of love in the souls of both parties. The dreamers also see themselves beating their brothers. And their sisters in their dreams. This indicates a strong love for each other and a strong relationship that binds them. When a dreamer sees in a dream arguing with his parents. This indicates his intense need for his parents and his desire to take care of them. Fighting in a dream may not be a sign of hostility. But it is nothing but arousal of feelings. The dreamer's anger towards the person seen in the dream and fighting with him. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a fight with someone you love. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with relatives about a married woman. A quarrel with a stranger or with relatives of a married woman has many good and bad meanings, including: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel through conversations on social media. communication

title: Interpretation of seeing a loofah in a dream (indicating extreme sadness)

preview.html: What does it mean to see a loofah in a dream? It is reported that the dreamer lived in a period of intense sadness. What is the interpretation of eating a loofah in a dream for a fortuneteller? It indicates that the fortuneteller is suffering from an illness. The meaning of seeing a loofah tree for a married woman? Near the vagina after narrow and wide fodder. What does it mean to see a loofah tree for a married woman? Interpretation of washing in a dream? It symbolizes happiness. What is the meaning of seeing fibers in a dream? It indicates the end of worry and worry. What is the meaning of seeing fibers in green? It indicates the death of anguish and anguish. What is the purpose of seeing fibers wet? His wife’s imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision Loofah in a dream Seeing a loofah in a dream means that the dreamer will experience a period of intense sadness. The vision indicates a feeling of disappointment due to failure to achieve the desired goal. The vision also symbolizes that the dreamer will suffer a major financial loss. Seeing black fibers in a dream indicates the dreamer’s difficult psychological state. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes the failure of a romantic relationship. If the loofah is not good in the dream, the vision indicates a problem and an attempt to solve problems. Eating a loofah in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer from illness. The vision warns that the dreamer will be betrayed by one of his relatives or a close friend. Bathing in a loofah in a dream shows the purity of the dreamer, as he is a person who protects himself, and God knows best. This vision also portends the coming of goodness and blessings in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about fibers by Ibn Sirin. Fibers in a dream may indicate problems that the fortuneteller falls into. Seeing fibers in a dream may indicate To the failure of projects planned by the dreamer. Fibers in a dream can indicate diseases to which the dreamer is exposed and betrayal that happens to him by some friends. Seeing a loofah pillow is evidence of some problems that the dreamer will get rid of soon. The fibrous quilt is evidence of psychological crises that The viewer is exposed to it due to failed emotional relationships. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi in a dream: Seeing white fibers inside the dream is evidence of success and the end of all family disputes that the fortuneteller experiences. Cotton fibers in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person who deals rationally. Fibers in a dream indicate an abundance of money. Seeing a body massage With fibers in a dream is a sign of luck and an opening to earning a livelihood. Bathing in fibers indicates a way out of a financial crisis. Interpretation of a dream about buying a bath towel for a married woman. Seeing a loofah in a married woman’s dream portends her imminent pregnancy. It also indicates a large number of children and that they have good morals. In While seeing it cut in a dream shows a woman’s ability to bear responsibility because of her wisdom and good management of matters. Seeing a loofah tree in a dream indicates rest after narrow and extensive feeding. The vision symbolizes the stability of the relationship between the woman and her husband. Seeing her using it to clean herself in a dream means sincere repentance, and getting closer to God Almighty, and avoid committing sins. If the loofah is new in the dream, it portends for the pregnant woman the birth of a male child, and he will bring with him happiness and be a good young man. While seeing his tree in a dream e.

title: What is the interpretation of escaping from a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Escaping from a camel in a dream, seeing camels seems somewhat confusing to many of us, and some often go to its realistic interpretation, which sees the camel as a symbol of endurance and patience. However, there are many connotations to this vision, including praise, what is disliked. What concerns us in this article is to review in more detail and explain all the connotations and special cases of escaping from a sentence. Escaping from a camel in a dream. Sentences indicate journeys and transitions in life, prevailing fears and burdens, difficulties of travel and journeys, patience in adversity, responsibility and honesty. Whoever sees that he is escaping From the camel, this indicates avoiding confrontation with enemies, staying away from temptation, staying away from places of adversity and adversity, abandoning falsehood and its people, and moving to another place. If a person is afraid to escape, this indicates to you the tribulations and trials that follow him, being saved from them, and being saved from hardships. Life and its pains, prosperity and security in this world. And if he sees a camel chasing him, this indicates misfortunes and problems. The escape of the camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the camel is interpreted in more than one way. And escaping from the camel, if it is not out of cowardice and fear, then it is redemption for the pioneer from the evils and fears that surround him. Through it, freedom from the restrictions that hinder his efforts, and salvation from long-term worries and sorrows. And if he sees camels chasing him in a familiar place, and he runs away from them, this indicates that he is far from the depths of temptation and temptation, and has abandoned sin and falsehood, and sits on God, and takes refuge in Him. To manage his affairs. And if he ran away from the camel and hid from it, this is evidence of distancing himself from suspicion, staying away from people and temptations, and staying away from disputes and useless discussions. Escaping from a camel in an individual’s dream. A camel in a dream indicates adversity, judgements, excessive anxiety, and negative thoughts that occupy one’s mind. If he sees that he is escaping from hunting camels, this indicates that he has escaped from an imminent disaster and will gain comfort and peace after a period of instability, confusion, and the dissolution of sorrows and despair. If he is afraid and runs away from camels, this indicates security and safety, achieving stability, removing worries, surviving dangers, and staying away. About suspicions, and avoiding useless disputes. Escaping from a camel in a dream for a married woman. In a dream, a camel symbolizes life’s problems, anxiety, over-thinking, and doubling the amount of responsibilities. Riding a camel means moving and looking for a new home or traveling for a need. If you see her escaping from a camel, this indicates To dissipate worry and despair, escape adversity and affliction, emerge from adversity, and come to useful solutions regarding the outstanding problems in her life. This vision also suggests removing negative thoughts from her mind, staying away from the causes of worry and worry, turning to useful actions, and avoiding idle talk and idle talk. Excessive, and making clear changes in her life. Escaping from a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman. A camel in a dream shows the problems of pregnancy and the difficulties of this period, and patience to overcome adversity.

This vision also suggests removing negative thoughts from her mind, staying away from the causes of worry and worry, turning to useful actions, and avoiding idle talk and idle talk. Excessive, and making clear changes in her life. Escaping from a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman. A camel in a dream shows the problems of pregnancy and the difficulties of this period, and patience to overcome adversity.

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dead person washing in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, seeing a dead person washing, washing a living person, a dead person, a living dead person, washing the dead person, and washing the hair of the dead person, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Washing the dead in a dream is one of the very frightening dreams that We see it in our dreams in a relatively uneven way and it causes a state of extreme fear and terror, and we also sometimes see that we are washing one of the dead people we know. In fact, which causes us a state of great sadness to obtain the correct interpretation. Ibn Sirin, the great dream interpreter, told us in his interpretations many important meanings that the dream of washing the dead carries in a dream, which a person must be very careful about in life. Interpretation of washing the dead In a dream, seeing an unmarried woman washing a dead person in a dream is evidence of the warning coming to her from God Almighty about the necessity of getting closer to God. Seeing an unmarried woman washing a dead person in a dream and trying to wrap him up but failing means that she will face many problems in her life, but she will get rid of them. And seeing a woman If an unmarried woman wants to wash the dead, but she does not know the correct method of washing in the Islamic religion, it is evidence of her distance from religion. For a married woman to see in a dream that her husband has died in the dream, and she is washing him and wrapping him, is evidence that she is doing her full job in life towards her husband. A married woman who watches the death of her husband in a dream without washing him indicates that he will repent soon. If a married woman dreams of someone who does not know how to wash, this is a sign that good things are coming to her. Seeing a pregnant woman washing her child and covering him in a dream is evidence of the ease and simplicity of childbirth. In fact. Seeing a pregnant woman washing her child in a dream indicates a long life for the child. For a pregnant woman to see that her husband died and he refuses to wash him in a dream is evidence of great love between spouses in life. A pregnant woman washing someone she knows who died in a dream is a sign of abundance. Sustenance. Seeing a married man dead and trying to conclude it and not knowing, is evidence of the problems you are facing, but they will end. In the event that one sees a dead person washing in a dream but does not know him, this is a sign that God will test his patience and faith. If a man sees in his dream that he is standing in A person’s washbasin in a dream indicates the problems he will face, but he will overcome them with difficulty. A man seeing that one of his relatives died in a dream and he is washing and wrapping it is evidence that God will provide for him abundantly. A man seeing that one of his relatives died in a dream and washing and wrapping him is evidence of goodness. Blessing and long life. Interpretation of washing the dead - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in a clothing market in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about walking in the clothes market in a dream When we search for the interpretation of the dream of walking in the clothes market in a dream and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, let us learn about the interpretations of the working scholars for this dream and the reader should know that the site managers do not provide interpretations but from the back. Overturning the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about walking in a clothing market in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is walking in a clothing market indicates that he will achieve his goals and ambitions to a great extent. Dreaming about walking in a clothing market in a dream is a sign that may indicate that he has overcome the difficulties that he had The dreamer is facing it in his life at that time. Seeing yourself walking in the market in a dream may indicate the abundant good that the dreamer will receive in his life during those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking in the clothing market, it could indicate the large amount that The dreamer gets it at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking on broken glass in a dream: A dream of walking on a glass may indicate that the dreamer suffered from a major problem during this period. In the event that someone saw that he was walking on glass, this may indicate To the bad reality that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. A dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that you discover a mistake made by someone during this time. A person’s dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that some people deceived and manipulated him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on agricultural land in a dream. Any person dreams that he is walking on agricultural land, it could be a sign of blessing and goodness that will come his way during that time. Walking on agricultural land in a dream could be a sign of the dreamer’s good behavior and morals. Who is dreaming? That they walked on agricultural land, may indicate the abundance of sustenance and money that will come to them in the coming period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that they walked on agricultural land, this may be an indication of positive changes that are occurring in your life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on Zamzam water in a dream. If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this may indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations in the coming period, thanks to God. Walking on Zamzam water in a dream may be a sign of recovery from the diseases that the dreamer suffered in the period. If a person sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this indicates the abundance of livelihood and broad satisfaction that the dreamer gains in This time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on my knees in a dream: If a person sees that he is walking on his knees, this may indicate the distress that the dreamer is going through in those days. Walking on his knees in a dream may be a sign of a crisis that the dreamer is going through during this time. If one saw that he was walking on his knees, this may be a sign of material loss that may occur

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing cookies in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing cookies in a dream? It indicates high values. The interpretation of seeing unmarried women eating cookies in a dream? Nutrition indicator. What is the interpretation of seeing a cookie picked by someone in a dream? Elements of calm and mood. What does it mean to see holiday cookies? A sign of a good future Full of goodness. What is the interpretation of seeing kneading biscuits in a dream? Elements of optimism and an increase in goodness and money. Interpretation of a dream about cookies by Ibn Sirin. Seeing cookies in a dream means rising prices. After that, seeing cookies not arriving in a dream is an indication that there is a person in life The fortuneteller takes money from him. So, seeing cookies in a dream in an easy way is evidence of achieving goals and dreams. Eating salty cookies in a dream is a symbol of faith and love. So, seeing someone taking cookies in a dream is a sign of Peace and freedom from family conflict. Interpretation of a dream about cookies according to Nabul: Dreaming about kneading cookies is a sign of optimism and an increase in goodness and money. So, seeing Eid cakes in a dream is evidence of the doctor’s words. Eid cakes are a sign of a good future full of goodness and happiness. Who is dreaming? Eating Eid cookies indicates an abundance of food. After that, seeing baking cookies in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is highly regarded. Then seeing cookies with dates in a dream means that there is a desire that the dreamer wants to fulfill. Eating chocolate chip cookies Evidence of guilt. Seeing a dream about cookies for a man. If a man dreams that he is eating Ajwa cookies, this indicates that he has many goals that he wants to achieve. If a man sees cookies in a dream, but he cannot eat them, this indicates that he has fallen into sadness. Seeing him eating cookies is evidence that the man has purity of intentions and a good soul. Then the man sees in a dream a plate full of cookies, and this is evidence that there is a benefit for him for some people who want to have them. So, dreaming of baked cookies is a sign of That he will be exposed to some problems and difficulties. Seeing a dream about cookies for single people. Cookies in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of marriage in the near future. So, seeing cookies in a dream for unmarried women is an indication of the scope of livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about cookies Association for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream that her husband has cookies and did not give her, this indicates that there are no feelings between them. Cookies in a married woman’s dream may indicate that she is deprived of her husband and may be due to divorce. Then seeing the married woman kneading cookies and putting Chocolate inside, this indicates the stability of the relationship between her and her husband.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cotton: A dream about white cotton in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of cotton for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl, whether she eats, buys musk, knits, or wears white cotton or more, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of cotton in a dream: Cotton in a dream is money without wool, and cotton tea cleanses sins, and cotton is a humble person. The jurist Sheikh Al-Usaimi explained the meanings of seeing cotton in dreams in a series Among the interpretations that are determined by the dreamer’s personality and the events that he sees. To dream of seeing cotton stored in a large bag means that we collect money and store it for whoever sees it. Also, seeing only white cotton without specifying it in one’s dream means good news, pleasant circumstances, spacious living, and ease of situation for whoever sees it, whether Whether male or female. Also, seeing cotton symbolizes obtaining money from lawful work, and it is said that it is money from inheritance, and cotton is a blessing, goodness, and happiness for whoever sees it. Interpretation of a dream about cotton by Ibn Shaheen: It is interpreted in nine aspects: jacket, benefit, money, clothing, and dignity. , prestige, religion, goodness, and a praiseworthy cause. And if he keeps it in luggage, then he stores it for his family. And whoever sees that he is stuffing cotton in a pillow or something like that, then he will marry a woman. Interpretation of cotton in a dream: It indicates a person who does not separate from the path of truth and does not abandon Regarding his religion, the visionary is a beautiful person inside and out and begins all his work by pleasing God, and thanks to his work, it goes well and easily, and the life of the person with the vision is always lawful. Seeing cotton in a dream indicates spending time with good people and correct and beautiful behaviors. It also shows reward and love for what God created. Do not hesitate to please God, and the dreamer will be loved by all people because of the beautiful and good deeds he does. Seeing cotton means sustenance, increasing money, and hiding secrets. It also indicates fame, reputation, respect, success at work and quickly rising in career. Cotton in a dream shows success in professional life, achieving your goals and ambitions, and a person who loves helping people and has morals. Interpretation of buying cotton in a dream: It indicates that you will make a revolution with what is halal, and the person who sees himself buying cotton in a dream indicates that you will meet with money and that you will be a wealthy owner who will do good in The path of truth: Interpretation of picking cotton in a dream: It indicates a person who works a lot and who puts in a lot of effort and will reach the profit you want. Picking cotton in a dream shows at the same time the large share that he gets. It indicates abandoning mistakes, not committing sins, and repenting for sins. Which I did. A person who picks cotton in a dream will get some benefits in real life. This vision shows getting rid of problems, making money, and living comfortably. Interpretation of cotton candy in a dream states getting rid of meaningless matters that keep the dreamer awake for a while, and he will meet happiness, and live life again. Interpretation of cotton tree in a dream: It indicates A person who appreciates everything. The person with the vision will see support and help from a person with strength and ability

title: Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream

preview.html: Commentators explain that there are two types of visions, where there is a false vision consisting of a pile of dreams, and the other is the correct visions that convey good news to the dreamer and comfort. Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream: Through the encyclopedia website, we present the interpretation of the dream of slippers for a married woman and a man, all through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream: We will show you the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream and the opinions of translators and scholars in detail below. Many visions and dreams are repeated in dreams and their meaning is not clear without the interpretation of the opinion of science, and seeing slippers in a dream is one of the ambiguous visions. Commentators point out that seeing slippers in a dream indicates that Goodness and comfort will approach the dreamer’s life, as it carries happy meanings and good news of success in this world. Scientists explain that seeing a lot of shoes and slippers in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is achieving his goals in this world. Seeing slippers in a dream and taking them off is interpreted as a sign of That the dreamer will coexist with security and stability. Seeing slippers in a dream indicates an improvement in the fortuneteller’s circumstances and the end of distress and anxiety, and circumstances will change for the better, God willing. Buying slippers in a dream for single women. In this paragraph, we discuss in detail the interpretation of buying slippers in a dream for a single woman in the following lines. Girls search for dream meanings And how it affects their lives, and many want to know the meaning of having slippers in a dream. Seeing buying slippers in a dream indicates that a girl is seeking to achieve her goals in life. Seeing slippers in a dream and single women in a state of confusion, interprets that they are trying to put their life paths in the right place. Seeing and wearing new slippers means that they have a high status and that everyone respects and respects them. Seeing slippers in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will receive happy news. It may be her marriage or her success in study and work. Slippers in a dream for pregnant women. Many women wonder about the interpretation of slippers in a dream for a pregnant woman, so we present the opinions of interpreters in the following paragraph. During the months of pregnancy, pregnant women see many incomprehensible dreams and dreams as a result of physical changes that affect On their psychological health, but commentators reported that seeing slippers is a reassuring dream. Seeing slippers in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she has gone through a difficult period due to pregnancy, but she is currently living a stable and calm life. Seeing slippers in a dream means that the pregnant woman is afraid of the birth process, but seeing It is good and the mother will carry her child in her arms safely. Seeing broken slippers in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the mother is living in a state of psychological disturbances and tension. Slippers in dreams for married people. After we dealt with the interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream at the beginning of the article, in this paragraph we consider slippers in a dream. For a married woman in detail. The dream of slippers in a married woman’s dream explains that she is going through a period of many crises, but the vision brings the end of distress and the emergence of comfort in the woman’s life.
